Posts.Content: Jul 9, 2015 02:57PM Mel2015 wrote: Hello fellow June starters! I had my first chemo (TCH+P) June 29, and the targeted therapy perjeta kicked my ass. Literally. Couldn't believe the diarrhea! It's easing up now, and immodium has helped. Food tastes terrible, so it's been great to see all the suggestions on this board. Anyone know if it's safe to get a manicure? I'd like to do something to make me feel better!
Posts.Title: Chemo in June 2015 zzlady Catfurr
